help: Used for products that are invoiced base on consumption. Consumption of previous period are to be filled for invoicing at next period. Important: to invoice consumption, the product has to be recorded in "invoicing content" as well and with checkbox "Invoice from consumption" as True. A consumption line can only be associated once to an invoice, regardless of the invoice status. A new consumption line have to be created to be taken in account on next invoice

A additionalBenefitContractLineList line can only be associated once to an invoice, regardless of the invoice status. A new additionalBenefitContractLineList line have to be created to be taken in account on next invoice
If invoicing pattern needs to be changed, please create a new contract
